title: Perma'd For talking shit to a guy that talked shit first?
body: Basically, I got on my account today to play league of legends. I've always been a toxic player but i've never talked shit to my own teammates first. I've only ever responded to aggression with toxicity because there are some people who think they're better than everyone. On another note I've only had one temporary suspension from league of legends which was over a year ago. The chat logs I got back were absolutely toxic But there was no context to what the person wrote to me before to even start this. I'd be fine with a 3 week suspension but a perma ban because of 2 games where i talked shit as well as one of those games being to a player on the enemy team who starts shit first? The other one I flamed my jungler because the jungler called all of the laners idiots and shitheads for not winning lane when he never helped. Rethink the bans riot. If you cant unban my account I want everything on it refunded and put on another account that's level 30.

replies.body: Someone else being toxic first doesn't give you a license to do it too. All you do is make it worse and become another problem. Mute them and focus on the game, and report them if you have to. Riot will not typically remove or reduce a punishment unless it was an error, and they absolutely do not transfer content between accounts.
